meanings.definition: A medical instrument used for visual examination of internal organs or cavities.
meanings.sent1: The doctor used endoscopes to look inside the patient's stomach.
meanings.sent2: The endoscopes helped the surgeon see the patient's lungs clearly.
meanings.sent3: The endoscopes peeked into the body like a tiny eye exploring a cave.
meanings.sent4: The endoscopes acted as tiny detectives, uncovering the secrets of the body.
meanings.sent5: The endoscopes illuminated the dark corners of the body, revealing hidden mysteries.

meanings.definition: To examine or treat with an endoscope.
meanings.sent1: The doctor carefully endoscopes the patient's throat to check for any issues.
meanings.sent2: She endoscopes the colon to detect any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The endoscopes play hide and seek with the body's secrets during the examination.
meanings.sent4: He endoscopes the body like an explorer venturing into uncharted territory.
meanings.sent5: Endoscopes gently explore the body, seeking out any hidden problems.
